sections.title: Crimson Assassin (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Crimson Assassin class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Crimson Assassin)
sections.description: Crimson assassins are proficient with simple weapons, light martial weapons, and light armor but not shields. They can cast spells in light armor without arcane spell failure.

sections.title: Spellcasting (Crimson Assassin)
sections.description: Crimson assassins cast illusion and transmutation spells from the sorcerer/wizard spell list using Charisma as their casting ability. They gain additional specific spells at certain levels and can replace known spells.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Ex) (Crimson Assassin)
sections.description: Functions as the rogue sneak attack ability, dealing +1d6 damage at 1st level and increasing by 1d6 every 3rd level. Damage bonuses from other sneak attack sources stack.

sections.title: Sabre Fighting (Ex) (Crimson Assassin)
sections.description: Grants Weapon Specialization with sawtooth sabres and treats them as light weapons. Provides Greater Weapon Focus at 5th level and Greater Weapon Specialization at 7th level without meeting fighter prerequisites.

sections.title: Prayer Attack (Su) (Crimson Assassin)
sections.description: A signature assassination technique that fascinates a target within 30 feet by weaving sawtooth sabres, allowing for a coup de grace after 3 rounds if the target remains fascinated.

sections.title: Red Shroud (Su) (Crimson Assassin)
sections.description: Creates a red mist that provides a dodge bonus to AC and fast healing based on Constitution modifier. Upon death, the assassin can choose to disintegrate into mist.

sections.title: Summon Mantis (Sp) (Crimson Assassin)
sections.description: Summons various types of blood-red giant mantises once per day as summon monster V. The assassin can mentally direct these vermin as a free action.

sections.title: Resurrection Sense (Su) (Crimson Assassin)
sections.description: Allows the assassin to sense if any creature she killed within the last year has been restored to life, as long as they're on the same plane.

sections.title: Mantis Form (Su) (Crimson Assassin)
sections.description: Transforms into a blood-red giant mantis as vermin shape II, with magical sawtooth sabre enhancements applying to claw attacks. Gains additional powers at higher levels including bleed damage and negative levels.

sections.title: Fading (Su) (Crimson Assassin)
sections.description: As an immediate action, becomes ethereal for an instant when attacked or making a Reflex save, providing a 50% chance to avoid damage.

sections.title: Mantis Doom (Sp) (Crimson Assassin)
sections.description: Uses creeping doom three times per day, summoning swarms of venomous praying mantises instead of the normal insects.
